list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an object) having an edge or point that is able to cut or pierce something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cut the cake with a very sharp knife
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cắt bánh với một con dao rất sắc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: producing a sudden, piercing physical sensation or effect.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I suddenly felt a sharp pain in my back
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đột nhiên cảm thấy một cơn đau nhói ở lưng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: distinct in outline or detail; clearly defined.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the job was a sharp contrast from her past life
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công việc này là một sự tương phản mạnh mẽ từ cuộc sống trong quá khứ của cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an action or change) sudden and marked.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was a sharp increase in interest rates
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có sự gia tăng mạnh về lãi suất

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having or showing speed of perception, comprehension, or response.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đôi mắt sắc bén của cô không bỏ lỡ gì cả

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of musical sound) above true or normal pitch.
precisely (used after an expression of time).
in a sudden or abrupt way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was brought up sharp by Helen's voice
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đã được đưa lên SHARP bởi giọng nói của Helen

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: above the true or normal pitch of musical sound.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he heard him playing a little sharp on the high notes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh nghe thấy anh chơi một chút về những nốt cao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a musical note raised a semitone above natural pitch.
a long, sharply pointed needle used for general sewing.
cheat or swindle (someone), especially at cards.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the fellow is drunk, let's sharp him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các đồng bào đang say, hãy sắc bén.
